step.cmd: Select and item in the center pane
Navigate to the "Related" tab and click on “click here”
step.stepresult: A window will appear, prompting you to select a second item

step.cmd: Select a second item from the same library

taskbody.result: The selected items will now show up as related items in the “Related” tab, and clicking an item will take you straight to that item. Note that when you relate item A to B, B will be automatically related to A. But relations are not transitive: relating A to B, and B to C, will not automatically relate A to C.
